entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
